messages.message: OK, there is an issue (3) -- weaviate-titan is crashing even if the image build completes. cc @Gaurav Saini on this. Can you take a look?

You can reproduce by running:

```cs stop weaviate-titan
make build-docker run-docker -C third-party/docker/weaviate-titan```

@raman.goel This is related to this (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/commit/633207e12158b3fd12fc21e1bd996bbc17c10bac) change to build weaviate-titan internally. Can you check? Reverting it, fixes it!

Hey, I have found the root cause for this and fixed it here: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/72103

would be great if I can get approval here.
I stamped this. @raman.goel do we need to add a backport to 25.28 since the original change was merged before the code cut yesterday?
